description: Try our easy to follow Golden Pear Frangipane Tart With Quick Pastry recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Golden Pear Frangipane Tart With Quick Pastry
name: Golden Pear Frangipane Tart With Quick Pastry Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 180 g Western Star chef's choice butter
230 g Western Star chef's choice butter

recipeInstructions.text: Bake for 30-35 minutes or until firm and golden. Remove from oven and allow to cool before removing from the tart tin. Serve alongside freshly whipped cream.
